[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero – Split” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#1e4a75″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ border_width_left=”30px” border_color_left=”#1c3f68″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#BED8CB” text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#bed8cb” header_letter_spacing=”1px” background_layout=”dark” width=”400px” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”125px||125px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Businesses for sale

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/businesses-for-sale-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Find just the right opportunity for you

If you’re looking to buy, we can help. JCG is pleased to offer the following funeral home and cemetery opportunities for purchase.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Listings” _builder_version=”4.16″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion admin_label=”Accordion” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ toggle_text_color=”#cc7022″ toggle_level=”h4″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Cemetery Opportunity in Iowa” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This business includes six cemeteries located in central Iowa. The cemeteries generate approximately $1,500,000 in revenue and perform approximately 250 interments per year. The real estate would be included in a transaction and has an estimated value of $598,000. The perpetual care fund of the cemetery is approximately $1,250,000 and the merchandise and service trust is approximately $350,000.

The acquiring party will also receive a successful monument and memorial business with projected annual revenues of approximately $1,273,000 and EBITDA of approximately $167,000.

For more information, please contact David Adams at dadams@johnsonconsulting.com or via telephone at (812) 717-0001.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Southern Oklahoma Cemetery” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This business includes one cemetery located in southern Oklahoma. The cemetery generates approximately $172,000 in revenue and performs approximately 80 interments per year. The cemetery occupies over 30 acres of land and includes an office building (2,000 sqft.) and maintenance building (800 sqft.). The critical and operational real estate has an estimated value of $417,000. With 10 acres of available land for future development and a perpetual care fund of $400,000, there is ample opportunity to enhance the cemetery’s offerings and revenue potential.

For more information, please contact Rob Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”North Texas Cemetery” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This business includes one cemetery located in northern Texas. The cemetery generates approximately $300,000 in revenue and performs approximately 127 interments per year. The existing cemetery includes 10 acres of land, and a Buyer would have the opportunity to also purchase an additional 4 acres adjacent to the property for future development.  With a perpetual care fund balance of $450,000, there is ample opportunity to enhance the cemetery’s offerings and revenue potential.

For more information, please contact Karen McCurdy at (480) 556-8519 or kmccurdy@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Funeral Home Opportunity in Southern Missouri” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This opportunity includes two locations. The business performs approximately 184 calls and generates roughly $621,000 in revenue. The overall average sale is around $3,375, and the PreNeed backlog is approximately $1,058,000. The real estate would be included in a transaction and has an estimated value of $1,260,000.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Central Texas Opportunity” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This business includes one heritage funeral home operation in Central Texas.  The generated revenues are approximately $500,000 with the funeral home performing approximately 100 calls+/-.  The business has a reported $1,039,000 +/- in preneed backlog. The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Central Pennsylvania Opportunity” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

This business opportunity includes two locations, in Central Pennsylvania.  The combined generated revenues are approximately $500,000 with the funeral homes performing 105-110 calls+/-.  The businesses have a reported $240,000 +/- in preneed backlog. The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Funeral Home in South Texas” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

A 100+ year old heritage funeral home operation, that includes one location in South Texas.  The generated revenues are approximately $700,000 with the funeral home performing approximately 140 to 150 calls+/-.  The business has a reported $11.5 mm +/- in preneed backlog. The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Multi-location Funeral Home and Combination Opportunity in North Texas” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

A multi-location funeral home and combination opportunity in north Texas.  The combined generated revenues are approximately $1.9 Million with the funeral home performing 400-450 calls and the cemetery, on average, performing 180-200+/- interments per year.  The business has a reported $2.8M +/- in preneed backlog.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Funeral Home Operation in Central Alabama” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

A heritage funeral home operation that includes one location in Central Alabama.  The generated revenues are approximately $452,000 with the funeral home performing approximately 80 calls+/-.  The business has a reported $685,000 +/- in preneed backlog. The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Funeral Home, Cemetery, and Cremation Operation in Western Washington” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Heritage funeral home, cemetery and cremation operation, that includes two locations in Western Washington state.  The generated revenues are approximately $820,000 with the funeral home performing approximately 300 calls+/- and the cemetery performing approximately 15 +/- interments annually.  The business has a reported $1.1 mm +/- in preneed backlog. The business is currently engaged in acquiring a cremation and building permit for a crematory operation designed to serve multiple adjacent counties.  The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Funeral Home and Cemetery Operation in Northern South Carolina” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

A heritage funeral home and cemetery operation in northern South Carolina.  The generated revenues are approximately $766,000 with the funeral home performing approximately 82 calls+/- and cemetery performing approximately 40 interments+/-.  The business has a reported $1,200,000 +/- in preneed backlog. The critical real estate would be included in the transaction.

For more information, please contact Robert Murray at rmurray@johnsonconsulting.com.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_stops_phone=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
